title: WTB T206 SGC 2 or 3’s  Any commons , any backs ... under $50
author: ibechillin33

posts.post_title: WTB T206 SGC 2 or 3’s  Any commons , any backs ... under $50
posts.post_content: I am a long time collector but new to T206. I love SGC graded cards and am focusing on a minimum of a grade 2 for anything that I buy.  Looking at acquiring any commons at this point regardless of back for a fair price.   Willing to buy up to and SGC 3 for around $50...  please let me know if there are any offers out there.Thanks and happy collecting!

Looking to buy any T206 commons SGC graded 2 or 3.   Not particular on backs.... Just want a card with good eye appeal and no creasing.    Open to any offers at this point.   Just starting the set and only have about a dozen cards at this point.   Thank you in advance to anyone that can help!


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
